message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare and exceptional item that I'm confident you'll love. If you're interested, please respond with 'yes' to purchase. If not, I'll move on to the next one.
I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product

I've got another great opportunity for you. This one's a bit different from the first, but I think you'll still find it interesting. I'm offering it to you for $10000, the same price as the last one. If you're not sure, just remember that the average quality of my products is 50%, so there's a good chance this one might be high-quality too. What do you say?
I'll take a chance on this one as well, hoping it's high-quality

I know you've had two successes in a row, but don't get too confident! This one's a bit of a wild card. I'm offering it to you for $10000, just like the others. But let me ask you, are you starting to think that the price might be a bit steep for these products? I'm just wondering...
I'm not convinced that the price is justified, I'll pass on this one

No worries about the last one, I understand your skepticism. But I've got another great opportunity for you. This one's a real showstopper, and I think you'll love it. Since you were hesitant last time, I'll give you a little nudge: I'm willing to throw in a 10% discount if you buy this one. That brings the price down to $9000. What do you think?
The discount makes it more appealing, I'll take a chance on this one

I'm glad the discount sealed the deal last time! Now, about this next one... I want to be upfront with you. Given that you've already bought two products and one of them was a dud, I'm willing to make a bet with you. I'll offer you a 'guarantee': if this product is low-quality, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. The price remains $10000. What do you say?
The guarantee makes me feel more comfortable, I'll take the risk

You're a brave one, I like that! Okay, let's see how this one turns out. I'm not offering any discounts this time, but I'll give you a little more information. I've been selling these products for a while now, and I've noticed that high-quality products tend to have a certain... aura about them. This one has it. I think you'll really like it. The price remains $10000. What do you think?
I'm not convinced by the aura, I'll pass on this one

No worries about the last one, I understand you're being cautious. Now, about this next one... I want to remind you that you've already bought three products, and two of them were low-quality. That means the probability of this one being high-quality is actually lower than 50%. I'm willing to take that into account and offer you a price of $8000. It's a steal, if I do say so myself. What do you think?
The discounted price makes it more appealing, I'll take a chance on this one

You're on a roll! Okay, let's see how this one goes. I've got a bit of a confession to make: I've been selling these products for a while, and I've learned that high-quality ones tend to sell for a premium. In fact, I've seen high-quality products sell for as much as $12000 in the past. This one is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discount. I'm willing to let it go for $9000. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the confession, I'll pass on this one

No worries about the last one, I understand you're being cautious. But I want to make a bet with you. I'll offer you a 'buy-it-now' deal on this high-quality product: if you buy it, I'll give you a chance to sell it back to me at the same price you paid for it in the next round. That's right, you can essentially rent this product for one round and then return it for a full refund. The price remains $10000. What do you think?
The 'buy-it-now' deal is intriguing, I'll take the chance

You're a shrewd negotiator, I like that! Now, about this next one... I want to remind you that you've got a chance to sell the last product back to me in the next round, so you might want to consider that when deciding whether to buy this one.
